pages.text: Your $(9)Life Steal$() is the percentage of your physical damage dealt that is added directly to your health.$(p)Generally, only weapons provide this stat.

$(9)$(n)Base Value:$() 1$(p)$(9)$(n)Max Value:$() 1024$(p)Note: A value of 1.0 is actually 0% life steal, but if the base was zero, percentage modifiers would have no effect, and flat modifiers don't convey the bonus correctly.
